rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/which-universities-have-the-most-crimes-against-students">     <title>Is London a more dangerous city for students?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/which-universities-have-the-most-crimes-against-students</link>     <description>London universities have the highest rates of burglary, robbery and violent crime. </description>     <dc:date>2014-06-25T12:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item you've received an offer, aced the exams and are going to university. Don't just put your feet up. There are things you need to plan before you get there.</description>     <dc:date>2014-06-13T12:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/help-make-a-video-about-online-safety">     <title>Help make a video about online safety</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/help-make-a-video-about-online-safety</link>     <description>The Well Versed project is rhyming for a reason.</description>     <dc:date>2014-04-15T13:54:18Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/how-warm-is-your-house">     <title>How warm is your house?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/how-warm-is-your-house</link>     <description>Average temperatures in British houses are going up \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd and so are the bills.</description>     <dc:date>2014-01-29T16:23:03Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/surviving-away-from-home/how-to-solve-all-your-flatmate-problems">     <title>Nine ways to solve your flatmate problems</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/surviving-away-from-home/how-to-solve-all-your-flatmate-problems</link>     <description>Have a problem with your flatmates, but don\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdt know how to deal with it? Check out these tips for resolving conflict.</description>     <dc:date>2013-12-02T07:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/surviving-away-from-home/dealing-with-fraud">     <title>Dealing with fraud</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/surviving-away-from-home/dealing-with-fraud</link>     <description>Fraud can be upsetting, frustrating and expensive. Find out what you can do to avoid it, and what to do if it happens to you.</description>     <dc:date>2013-11-28T16:41:05Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/cycling-at-uni">     <title>Cycling at uni</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/cycling-at-uni</link>     <description>Cycling can get you around quickly and cheaply while keeping you fit. Find out how to get started.</description>     <dc:date>2013-11-21T16:31:10Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/surviving-away-from-home/spam-email-holds-your-computer-files-to-ransom">     <title>Spam email holds your computer files to ransom</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/surviving-away-from-home/spam-email-holds-your-computer-files-to-ransom</link>     <description>The National Crime Agency has issued a warning about email attachments that make your files inaccessible until you pay up.</description>     <dc:date>2013-11-18T14:47:11Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/350-year-old-tips-for-freshers-revealed">     <title>350-year-old tips for freshers revealed</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/350-year-old-tips-for-freshers-revealed</link>     <description>A book of rules for new students written in 1660 reveals how attitudes have changed - and how they've stayed the same.</description>     <dc:date>2013-10-10T14:16:29Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/freshers-week-survival-guide">     <title>Freshers' week survival guide</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/freshers-week-survival-guide</link>     <description>During your first week at university you may find things are a bit hectic. Keep your feet firmly on the ground and get off to a good start by reading...</description>     <dc:date>2013-09-09T12:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/making-the-most-of-freshers-fair">     <title>Making the most of Freshers' Fair</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/making-the-most-of-freshers-fair</link>     <description>Freshers\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Fair is your chance to find out about university societies and pick up some freebies. Find out how to make the most of it.</description>     <dc:date>2013-09-04T13:50:50Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/surviving-away-from-home/top-tips-for-university-travel">     <title>Top tips for university travel</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/surviving-away-from-home/top-tips-for-university-travel</link>     <description>The cost of transport can make up around 7-10% of a student\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds total budget but in some cases it can be free.</description>     <dc:date>2013-07-05T06:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/learning-to-drive">     <title>Learning to drive</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/learning-to-drive</link>     <description>Driving isn't just handy for getting around - it can be a career-booster, too. Find out how to get qualified.</description>     <dc:date>2013-05-24T15:45:20Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/making-the-most-of-the-summer-break">     <title>Making the most of the summer break</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/making-the-most-of-the-summer-break</link>     <description>Whether you're a fresher-to-be or in between years, making the most of summer can make a big difference to your time at uni.</description>     <dc:date>2013-05-14T12:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/do-you-speak-with-two-different-accents">     <title>Do you speak with two different accents?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/do-you-speak-with-two-different-accents</link>     <description>Young people find it easier to change their accent depending on who they are with.</description>     <dc:date>2013-05-13T14:55:06Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/what-do-we-really-value">     <title>What do we really value?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/what-do-we-really-value</link>     <description>Most people think good relationships are more important than money.</description>     <dc:date>2013-02-27T12:15:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/safer-internet-day-2">     <title>Safer Internet Day 2013</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/safer-internet-day-2</link>     <description>February 5 is Safer Internet Day. </description>     <dc:date>2013-02-05T11:10:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/will-your-phone-get-you-run-over">     <title>Will your phone get you run over?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/will-your-phone-get-you-run-over</link>     <description>Nearly a third of people use their phone while crossing the road, according to a study in the US.</description>     <dc:date>2012-12-13T16:04:25Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/surviving-away-from-home/cleaning-and-cooking-essentials">     <title>Cleaning and cooking essentials</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/surviving-away-from-home/cleaning-and-cooking-essentials</link>     <description>Moving away to university means learning a lot of new things \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd including how to clean and cook for yourself. Read on for our list of essential items that every student house will need.</description>     <dc:date>2012-09-20T15:10:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/buying-books-and-equipment">     <title>Buying books and equipment</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/buying-books-and-equipment</link>     <description>It's not all about paying the bills - a lot of your university cash will go on books and course equipment. Find out exactly how much you need to budget for.</description>     <dc:date>2012-09-19T05:55:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/student-clubs-and-societies">     <title>Student clubs and societies</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/student-clubs-and-societies</link>     <description>Clubs and societies are an important part of student life. They cater for nearly all tastes and interests, and can be one of the best ways of taking time away from study and meeting new people.</description>     <dc:date>2012-09-18T11:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/student-unions">     <title>Student Unions</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/independent-living/starting-university/student-unions</link>     <description>Students\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd unions can help you with everything from dealing with your landlord to getting a cheap drink. Read on to find out more.</description>     <dc:date>2012-09-17T11:45:00Z</dc:date>   </item> </rdf:RDF>
